attributes.action: Exempt vehicles that use sustainable fuels from 2030 ban
attributes.background: The Government should exempt new car/van/motorbike/trucks that use sustainable fuels from the 2030 petrol and diesel new car sales ban. Vehicles that use fuels from sustainable sources should be exempt from the ban to help reduce pollution & overall emissions faster.
attributes.additional_details:
Sustainable fuels could use existing pumps/infrastructure for petrol/diesel, and cause much less environmental damage than installing many more EV chargers.
 
Change to vehicles that use sustainable fuels could be more realistic & affordable for many.
